content: impeccable knits now has their own ravelry group ~ impeccable knitters gathering place 1 ~ come join us - you d be ever so welcome ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ manly scarf pattern #6 is here **the pattern** i really like this one the pattern is totally reversible so your scarf looks exactly the same on the front as on the back 1 http //www ravelry com/groups/impeccable-knitters-gathering-place
